      • invoke

        public java.lang.Object invoke(java.lang.reflect.Method method,
                      long methodHash,
                      java.lang.Object[] params)
                        throws SDConnectionException,
                               java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Invoke a remote method. We use this function to communicate with remote server, marshal the method and parameters, then unmarshal the result. If something goes wrong throws an exception
        参数:
        method -
        methodHash -
        params -
        返回:
        抛出:
        SDConnectionException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
